Class ProjectController

java.lang.Object
controller.ProjectController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IProjectServices
public class ProjectController extends Object implements IProjectServices
Manages all project‐related operations:
  • Retrieve eligible projects for any user
  • Fetch projects created by a manager or view all projects
  • Lookup, add, and remove projects
  • Filter projects by neighborhood and flat type
Since:
24/4/2025
Version:
final
Author:
FCSH Group 2

  • Method Details

    • getEligibleProjects

      public Map<String,Project> getEligibleProjects(User user)
      Returns only those projects that are visible and for which the given user meets age and marital‐status eligibility.
      Specified by:
      getEligibleProjects in interface IProjectServices
      Parameters:
      user - the User (Applicant, Officer, or Manager) to check eligibility for
      Returns:
      map of project names to eligible Project objects

    • managerGetProjects

      public Map<String,Project> managerGetProjects(Manager manager)
      Retrieves all projects created by the specified manager.
      Specified by:
      managerGetProjects in interface IProjectServices
      Parameters:
      manager - the Manager whose projects to fetch
      Returns:
      map of project names to Project objects managed by this manager

    • managerViewAllProjects

      public Map<String,Project> managerViewAllProjects()
      Retrieves every project in the system, regardless of manager.
      Specified by:
      managerViewAllProjects in interface IProjectServices
      Returns:
      map of all project names to their Project objects

    • getProject

      public Project getProject(String projectName)
      Looks up a single project by its name.
      Specified by:
      getProject in interface IProjectServices
      Parameters:
      projectName - the unique name of the project
      Returns:
      the Project object if found; null otherwise

    • addProject

      public boolean addProject(Project project)
      Adds a new project to the repository.
      Specified by:
      addProject in interface IProjectServices
      Parameters:
      project - the Project object to add
      Returns:
      true if successfully added; false if the name already exists

    • removeProject

      public boolean removeProject(String projectName)
      Removes an existing project by name.
      Specified by:
      removeProject in interface IProjectServices
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project to remove
      Returns:
      true if successfully removed; false otherwise

    • filterProjects

      public HashMap<String,Project> filterProjects(String neighborhood, String flatType, Map<String,Project> projects)
      Filters the given set of projects by neighborhood and flat type.
      Specified by:
      filterProjects in interface IProjectServices
      Parameters:
      neighborhood - the neighborhood to match (empty for no filter)
      flatType - the flat type to match (empty for no filter)
      projects - the map of project names to Project objects to filter
      Returns:
      a new map of project names to Project objects that match the criteria
